transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: So very good morning Pravesh Sharma baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: To aapne kal bola tha ki whatsapp group kuch bana nahi. Sir wo aapka number hume dikhta nahi hai. Main number aap mujhe ek bar bata dijiye. Hume na sirf recording 96
Customer: 96
Executive: 9624
Customer: 24
Executive: 00
Customer: 00
Executive: 5757
Customer: 5757
Executive: Ek second rukiye. Aapka number save kar lu.

Executive: Dekhiye sir maine aapko hi likh ke bheja hai aapke pass aa gaya?
Customer: Ha aa gaya.
Executive: Main abhi ab whatsapp group bana raha hu. Raju Maurya jo aapke account manager hai. Unko bhi main isme add kar raha hu. Right sir maine number aapka save kar liya hai. Aur ek hum video meet karenge aap kab free hai sir?
Customer: Aaj to nahi jaunga main free.
Executive: Haan ji? Kal kal kal kal ho sakta hu free.
Executive: Sir kal to wo Gurupurab hai na off rahega. Aaj pure 6 baje tak kabhi bhi free ho aap matlab kisi time bhi.
Customer: Leta aaiye office.
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Haan ji boliye.
Executive: Ab main keh raha tha aap kab free rahenge?
Customer: Kal kal.
Executive: Kal sir kal na Gurupurab hai kal off hai IndiaMART ka. To main keh raha tha sir kal na sir off hai yaha pe head office mein. Kal wo Gurupurab hai na sir.
Customer: Kya hai? To sir Gurupurab hai wo jo sikhs ka hota hai kuch unka birthday hota hai. To to aap sham ke 6 baje tak hum office mein hai jaise hi aap free hote ho na sir. To aap usi time hi mujhe call kariyega. Right sir aur main group mein dal dunga jab main free hounga tab. Haan aap group mein daliye ga varna fir hum Thursday ko to kar hi lenge. Main matlab kuch cheeze aapko bataunga kaise kaise cheeze work karti hai IndiaMART pe. Shayad aapko pata bhi ho but main ek bar main main cheeze sari aapko brief out kar dunga apni taraf se na sir. To isse kya hoga clarity mil jayegi aapko puri ek ek cheez ki. Jo abhi chal raha hai jo acche promotion ke liye required hai wo main aapko ek ek cheez dikha dunga jisse aapko help milega aage jaake. Thik hai sir?
Customer: Koi baat nahi.
Executive: To mujhe wo kar dijiyega. Baki ek feedback aayega feedback jarur dijiyega. Thik hai sir? Group main bana raha hu.
Customer: Okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer said WhatsApp group was not created.

- Customer inquired about scheduling a video meet.



Resolution:

- Executive saved customer's number and sent a 'Hi'.

- Executive is creating a WhatsApp group.

- Executive explained Gurupurab holiday, suggested rescheduling.

- Executive offered to brief customer on IndiaMART features.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will update availability in the group.

- Executive will share feedback form.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- whatsapp group, video meet, gurupurab, indiaMART features
